front.title: RPIDS -- Rich Presence Information Data Format for Presence Based on the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: The Rich Presence Information Data Format for SIP (RPIDS) adds elements to the Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) that provide additional information about the presentity and its contacts. This information can be translated into call routing behavior and/or be delivered to watchers. The information is designed so that much of it can be derived automatically, e.g., from calendar files or user activity.
